mapper.select: select * from systemconfig where u_id=#{uId} and c_id=#{cId}
mapper.insert: insert into SYSTEMCONFIG (U_ID, C_ID, GUIDANCESYSTEM, ALB, FPG, RPG, RCPA, DSEA, FSEA, DLCC, HFS, HRS, FSV, RSV, FSM, RSM, RVMH, ESS) values (#{uId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{guidancesystem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fpg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rpg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rcpa,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dsea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fsea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dlcc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hrs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fsv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rsv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvmh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ess,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update: update systemconfig set guidanceSystem= #{guidancesystem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},alb=#{alb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},fpg= #{fpg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},rpg= #{rpg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},rcpa= #{rcpa,jdbcType=VARCHAR},dsea=#{dsea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},fsea= #{fsea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},dlcc=#{dlcc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},hfs=#{hfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},hrs=#{hrs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},fsv= #{fsv,jdbcType=VARCHAR},rsv=#{rsv,jdbcType=VARCHAR},fsm= #{fsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},rsm=#{rsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},rvmh= #{rvmh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},ess=#{ess,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where u_id=#{uId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and c_id=#{cId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
